movies_list.title: 3 Idiots
movies_list.description: Three engineering students embark on a quest to find their missing friend, and along the way, they reflect on their own lives and the pressures of academia.
movies_list.cast: Aamir Khan, R. Madhavan, Sharman Joshi

movies_list.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
movies_list.description: A young couple fall in love during a trip to Europe but must overcome familial and cultural obstacles to be together.
movies_list.cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Amrish Puri

movies_list.title: Sholay
movies_list.description: Two ex-convicts are hired by a retired police officer to capture a ruthless bandit who terrorizes a village.
movies_list.cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Dharmendra, Hema Malini

movies_list.title: Lagaan
movies_list.description: In 1893, a group of Indian villagers challenge British colonists to a game of cricket as a way to avoid paying high taxes.
movies_list.cast: Aamir Khan, Gracy Singh, Raj Zutshi

movies_list.title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
movies_list.description: Three friends reunite for a road trip through Spain, where they confront their personal fears and discover new facets of themselves.
movies_list.cast: Hrithik Roshan, Farhan Akhtar, Abhay Deol

movies_list.title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham
movies_list.description: A young man from a wealthy family marries a woman from a lower socioeconomic background, leading to family conflicts and estrangement.
movies_list.cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Amitabh Bachchan, Kajol

movies_list.title: Barfi!
movies_list.description: A charming mute man and his love for two very different women in a heartwarming story of love, laughter, and acceptance.
movies_list.cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra, Ileana D'Cruz

movies_list.title: Piku
movies_list.description: A quirky comedy-drama about a daughter who cares for her elderly father, balancing her professional life and personal challenges.
movies_list.cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Deepika Padukone, Irrfan Khan

movies_list.title: Queen
movies_list.description: A young woman embarks on a solo honeymoon trip to Europe after her fianc√© calls off their wedding, leading to self-discovery and personal growth.
movies_list.cast: Kangana Ranaut, Rajkummar Rao, Lisa Haydon

movies_list.title: Dangal
movies_list.description: Based on a true story, this film follows a former wrestler who trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers.
movies_list.cast: Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh

movies_list.title: Superbad
movies_list.description: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.
movies_list.cast: Jonah Hill, Michael Cera, Christopher Mintz-Plasse

movies_list.title: The Hangover
movies_list.description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing.
movies_list.cast: Zach Galifianakis, Bradley Cooper, Justin Bartha

movies_list.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
movies_list.description: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 1970s, but that's all about to change.
movies_list.cast: Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Steve Carell

movies_list.title: Dumb and Dumber
movies_list.description: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.
movies_list.cast: Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly

movies_list.title: Step Brothers
movies_list.description: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.
movies_list.cast: Will Ferrell, John C. Reilly, Mary Steenburgen

movies_list.title: Groundhog Day
movies_list.description: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.
movies_list.cast: Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott

movies_list.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
movies_list.description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many very silly obstacles.
movies_list.cast: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle

movies_list.title: Mean Girls
movies_list.description: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.
movies_list.cast: Lindsay Lohan, Jonathan Bennett, Rachel McAdams

movies_list.title: The Big Lebowski
movies_list.description: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
movies_list.cast: Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore

movies_list.title: Tropic Thunder
movies_list.description: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.
movies_list.cast: Ben Stiller, Jack Black, Robert Downey Jr.

movies_list.title: Inception
movies_list.description: A skilled thief leads a team into people's dreams to steal information, but is given the inverse task of planting an idea into a CEO's mind.
movies_list.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page

movies_list.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies_list.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies_list.cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

movies_list.title: The Godfather
movies_list.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies_list.cast: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

movies_list.title: The Dark Knight
movies_list.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.
movies_list.cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

movies_list.title: Pulp Fiction
movies_list.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies_list.cast: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

movies_list.title: Fight Club
movies_list.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
movies_list.cast: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf

movies_list.title: Forrest Gump
movies_list.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
movies_list.cast: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

movies_list.title: The Matrix
movies_list.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
movies_list.cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

movies_list.title: Gladiator
movies_list.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
movies_list.cast: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen

movies_list.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies_list.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.
movies_list.cast: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney

movies_list.title: Inception
movies_list.description: A skilled thief leads a team into people's dreams to steal information, but is given the inverse task of planting an idea into a CEO's mind.
